entry.title: Root Application Context in Play 2.1
entry.content:
So Play 2.1 is officialy out and one of the new features it brings is the ability to configure root application context. It have been in 2.1 branch for a long-long time and I don’t see this mentioned in highlights section, but nevertheless it’s there and it works.
To assign a root context to your play app just open your application.conf file and add the following line

Make sure you have it starting with slash (/) otherwise play will throw a configuration error at you saying “Invalid application context”.
